description:
“Dude, he’s huge!” Pavel said seconds after he saw Hugh naked.
I wasn’t sure if he was referring to Hugh’s muscles, his thick cock, or both. Either way, Pavel had a smile on his face so I think he was happy.
Hugh was kind of shy, but when you’re with Pavel you can’t help but laugh. Pavel was joking around and he got Hugh going as well.
“I wan’t to get a taste of this,” Pavel said, grabbing Hugh’s cock. “I’m not sure I’ll be able to get my mouth around it...”
Surprisingly, Pavel was able to take most of it.
Hugh was at full mast when he said he wanted to fuck Pavel. He went in slowly, but then sped up.
“Oh man he’s stretching me out!” Pavel said. But I know he liked it because it wasn’t long before he blew a load so big and far it splattered the camera lens!
title: Hugh & Pavel: Bareback
